description: Vite configuration file for a React project, enabling React plugin and camelCase CSS modules.

A basic HTML file (`index.html`) serving as the entry point for a React (or similar JSX-based) application.  It includes meta tags for charset, viewport, and favicon, and loads the main application script from `/src
Utility functions for generating image URLs, based on a relative path.

This React JSX file (`main.jsx`) renders the main application component (`App.jsx`) within a `React.StrictMode` context, initializing the application and importing necessary CSS and fonts (`index.css`, `Outfit`, `Roboto`).

This React component (`App.jsx`) renders a portfolio website layout, including a navigation bar (`Navbar`), hero section (`Hero`), about section (`About`), experience section (`Experience`), projects section (`Projects`), and contact section (`Contact`).  It uses

A React component displaying a hero section with a personal introduction ("Hi, I'm Ada"), a brief description, a contact button, and a profile image, utilizing styled components and an image loading utility.

A responsive navigation bar component for a portfolio website.  It features a title, a menu button toggling a list of navigation links (About, Experience, Projects, Contact), and uses CSS modules for styling.
A React component that displays a section of project cards.  It reads project data from `projects.json` and renders each project using the `ProjectCard` component.

A React component (`ProjectCard.jsx`) that displays a project card with an image, title, description, skill list, and links to a demo and source code.  It uses styled-components (via `ProjectCard.module.css`)
A React component displaying professional experience.  It renders a skills section from `skills.json` and a work history section from `history.json`, using images and styled components.
A React component (`Contact.jsx`) rendering a contact section with email, LinkedIn, and GitHub links, styled using CSS modules.  It uses a helper function `getImageUrl` for image path resolution.
A React component displaying an "About Me" section with a profile image, and a list of skills (Frontend, Backend, UI Design) using styled components and custom image loading.
